item.title: Rclone Automount on Linux
item.author: Eric
item.description: Automatically Mounting rclone Remote Directory on Debian 11 To automatically mount the remote directory using rclone on system restart in Debian 11, you can create a systemd service unit. Here’s how you can do it: Create a systemd service unit file: Open a terminal and create a new service unit file using your favorite text editor. For example: sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/rclone-mount.service Add the following content to the file: [Unit] Description=RClone Mount Service After=network-online.
